trans-unit.source: EEA - European Enviroment Agency (EU)
trans-unit.target: EEA-欧洲环境署（EU）

trans-unit.source: A CMF portal tool that can be retrieved using CMF method getToolByName: This a simple container for Google connections. It provides a basic browser interface to add and remove connections.
trans-unit.target: Een CMF-portaalgereedschap dat kan worden opgehaald met behulp van de CMF-methode getToolByName:Dit is een eenvoudige container voor Google-verbindingen.Het biedt een basis browserinterface om verbindingen toe te voegen en te verwijderen.

trans-unit.source: A CMF portal tool to store Google connections;
trans-unit.target: Een CMF-portaaltool voor het opslaan van Google-verbindingen;

trans-unit.source: A Google Analytics custom report by dimensions, metrics, start-date, end-date, filters and sort order. It is actually a query object for Google Analytics API.
trans-unit.target: Een Google Analytics op maat gemaakt rapport op basis van dimensies,metriek,startdatum,einddatum,filters en sorteervolgorde.Het is eigenlijk een query object voor Google Analytics API.

trans-unit.source: A low level API to access Google API;
trans-unit.target: Een laag niveau API om toegang te krijgen tot Google API;

trans-unit.source: A python package that provides a low level Google Connection and a generic connection error GoogleClientError. To use this connection you’ll need an AuthBase authentication token. You can get one by calling Google like:
trans-unit.target: 提供低级Google Connection和通用连接错误GoogleClientError的python软件包。要使用此连接，您需要一个AuthBase身份验证令牌。您可以通过致电Google来获得，例如：

trans-unit.source: After you login into your Google Analytics account, you’ll be asked to grant access to yourdomain.com to access Analytics statistics. If you do so, Google will redirect your browser to the next link provided, adding a request parameter token=<one-session-authsub-token>, in our case
trans-unit.target: 登录Google Analytics（分析）帐户后，系统会要求您授予对yourdomain.com的访问权限，以访问Google Analytics（分析）统计信息。如果您这样做，Google会将您的浏览器重定向到所提供的下一个链接，并在我们的示例中添加请求参数token = <one-session-authsub-token>

trans-unit.source: Analytics
trans-unit.target: 分析

trans-unit.source: Analytics Report
trans-unit.target: 分析报告

trans-unit.source: Antonio De Marinis (European Environment Agency),
trans-unit.target: Antonio De Marinis(欧洲环境署);

trans-unit.source: As this token was provided in clear to you, it can be used only once to query Google API, that’s why you’ll need to exchange it for a multi-session one. But this time you can not do it from browser. So here eea.google.api comes in.
trans-unit.target: 由于此令牌已明确提供给您，因此只能用于查询Google API一次，这就是为什么您需要将其交换为多会话令牌的原因。但是这一次您无法通过浏览器执行此操作。因此，这里出现了eea.google.api。

trans-unit.source: Bug Fix: Fixed i18n missing tags in .pt files [prospchr refs #5160]
trans-unit.target: Bug Fix:Vastgesteld i18n ontbrekende tags in .pt bestanden [prospchr refs #5160].

trans-unit.target: Bug fix:vast stinkend ei [ghicale]

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: set socket timeout to prevent hanging out connection on xmlrpc calling using eventlet [lucas refs #29063]
trans-unit.target: Bugfix:stel de socket timeout in om te voorkomen dat de verbinding op xmlrpc wordt afgehangen met behulp van eventlet [lucas refs #29063].

trans-unit.source: Change: Auto-include zcml within plone context in order to make this package work without having to add it within buildout zcml directive. [avoinea]
trans-unit.target: 更改。在plone上下文中自动包含zcml,以使这个包能够正常工作,而不需要在buildout zcml指令中添加它。[avoinea]

trans-unit.source: Change: Changed fetch url for jenkins build install script to the install script from the main EEA CPB repository [olimpiurob refs #22402]
trans-unit.target: 更改。将jenkins构建安装脚本的URL地址改为从EEA CPB主仓库中获取安装脚本[OLIMpiurob refs #22402]。

trans-unit.target: 谷歌分析 (eea.google.analytics)

trans-unit.source: Google Analytics reports created this way can be made available via portlets. Right now there is an example under skins folder.
trans-unit.target: Google Analytics-rapporten die op deze manier worden gemaakt,kunnen via portlets beschikbaar worden gesteld.Op dit moment is er een voorbeeld onder skins map.

trans-unit.source: Google Tool (eea.google.tool)
trans-unit.target: 谷歌工具(eea.google.tool)

trans-unit.source: Here table is a (dimensions, metrics) python generator
trans-unit.target: Hier is de tabel een (afmetingen,metriek)python generator

trans-unit.source: If something doesn’t work well this will raise a GoogleClientError, else it will return a Google Data Feed Response
trans-unit.target: 如果某些操作无法正常进行，则会引发GoogleClientError，否则将返回Google数据Feed响应

trans-unit.source: If you provided an invalid token it will quietly fail and return you a None object, else it will return you a multi-session token. Now you are connected with Google, forever :).
trans-unit.target: Als u een ongeldige token verstrekt zal het stilletjes falen en u een Geen-object teruggeven,anders zal het u een multi-sessie token teruggeven.Nu ben je verbonden met Google,voor altijd :).

trans-unit.source: This package contains useful tools for talking with Google Analytics
trans-unit.target: 这个软件包包含了与Google Analytics对话的有用工具。

trans-unit.source: This package contains useful tools for talking with Google Analytics.
trans-unit.target: 这个软件包包含了与Google Analytics对话的有用工具。

trans-unit.source: This package provides the browser interface to register with Google Analytics and defines two storage models: Analytics and AnalyticsReport. Also it provides a utility to easily access low level api.Connection and another one to parse Google response XML.
trans-unit.target: Dit pakket biedt de browserinterface om zich te registreren bij Google Analytics en definieert twee opslagmodellen:Analytics en AnalyticsReport.Ook biedt het een hulpprogramma om gemakkelijk toegang te krijgen tot low level api.connection en een ander om Google response XML te parsen.

trans-unit.source: This will store AuthSub token and it’s also a container for Analytics Reports. It provides a basic browser interface to get token from Google and to manage reports.
trans-unit.target: 这将存储AuthSub令牌，它也是Google Analytics（分析）报告的容器。它提供了基本的浏览器界面，可从Google获取令牌并管理报告。

trans-unit.source: With this connection you can check it’s status:
trans-unit.target: 通过此连接，您可以检查其状态：

trans-unit.source: XML Parser utility
trans-unit.target: XML解析器工具

trans-unit.source: You can also make a safe request by calling .request method. This will return a None object if something works wrong.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过调用.request方法来发出安全请求。如果出现问题，这将返回None对象。

trans-unit.source: data - query parameters
trans-unit.target: gegevens-queryparameters

trans-unit.source: method - request method: GET or POST
trans-unit.target: methode-vraag methode:GET of POST

trans-unit.source: python2.4+
trans-unit.target: python2.4+

trans-unit.source: scope - the Google service you want to access;
trans-unit.target: scope-de Google-service die u wilt gebruiken;
